page.title: Pasture Journal
page.description: Track and manage your pasture journal entries to monitor herd movements and field usage.

dialog.title: Create Journal Entry
dialog.description: Add a new entry to your pasture journal. Fill in the field name, date, and select the herd.

editDialog.title: Edit Journal Entry
editDialog.description: Update the details of this pasture journal entry.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Journal Entry
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No journal entries yet
empty.description: Start tracking your pasture usage by creating your first journal entry.

confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry? This action cannot be undone.
